item.title: CO-71 North/CO-96 East at CO-71/CO-96 Split
item.description: CO-71 North/CO-96 East at CO-71/CO-96 split. Turn right to continue east on CO-96.

item.title: CO-71 North/CO-96 East at CO-71/CO-96 Junction
item.description: CO-71 North/CO-96 East at CO-71/CO-96 junction. Turn right on CO-96 East for Eads; continue north on CO-71 to Limon.

item.title: CO-96 East at CO-71
item.description: CO-96 East at CO-71 in Ordway. CO-96 East joins CO-71 North through Ordway. Turn right for CO-71 south to Rocky Ford. Turn left for CO-71 North/CO-96 East to Limon (via CO-71) and Eads (via CO-96).

item.title: CO-96 East Approaching CO-71
item.description: CO-96 East approaching CO-71 in Ordway.

item.title: CO-96 East at CO-207
item.description: CO-96 East at CO-207 south to Manzanola. Turn left for Crowley; continue east on CO-96 for Ordway.

item.title: End CO-167 North at CO-96
item.description: End CO-167 North at CO-96 in Crowley County.

item.title: CO-167 North Approaching CO-96
item.description: CO-167 North approaching CO-96. Turn left for CO-96 west to Boone and Pueblo; right for CO-96 east to Ordway.

item.title: US-50 East/CO-96 East Approaching US-50/CO-96 Split
item.description: US-50 East/CO-96 East approaching US-50/CO-96 split. Use left lane for CO-96 East to Eads.

item.title: US-50 East/CO-96 East Approaching US-50/CO-96 Split
item.description: US-50 East/CO-96 East approaching US-50/CO-96 split. Use left lane for CO-96 East to Ordway.

item.title: US-50 East - Pueblo Chemical Depot
item.description: US-50 East approaching Pueblo Chemical Depot/PuebloPlex interchange.

item.title: US-50 East - Pueblo Memorial Airport
item.description: US-50 East at Pueblo Memorial Airport interchange.

item.title: US-50 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-50 east. Distance to La Junta, and Lamar.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching CO-47/CO-96
item.description: US-50 East approaching CO-47/CO-96 West/4th St./Cesar Chavez Blvd. CO-96 joins US-50 eastbound to Avondale.

item.title: CO-96 East (4th St.) at Santa Fe Ave.
item.description: CO-96 East (4th St.) at Santa Fe Ave. in Pueblo. Turn right for I-25 southbound; continue east on 4th St. for I-25 north.

item.title: CO-96 East at CO-45
item.description: CO-96 East at CO-45 (South Pueblo Blvd.)

item.title: End CO-67 South at CO-96
item.description: End CO-67 South at CO-96 in Wetmore.

item.title: CO-67 South at CO-96 - Frontier Pathways
item.description: CO-67 South at CO-96. CO-96 is designated as the Frontier Pathways Scenic Byway.

item.title: CO-67 South at CO-96
item.description: CO-67 South at CO-96 in Wetmore. Use CO-96 west to Westcliffe; CO-96 east to Pueblo.

item.title: CO-67 South Approaching CO-96
item.description: CO-67 South approaching CO-96 in Wetmore.

item.title: US-287 North/CO-96 West at US-287 North
item.description: US-287 North/CO-96 West at US-287 North in Eads. Merge right to continue north on US-287.

item.title: US-287 North at CO-96
item.description: US-287 north at CO-96. CO-96 joins US-287 north into Eads.

item.title: US-287 North at CO-96
item.description: US-287 north at CO-96. Use CO-96 east to Sheridan Lake. Use US-287 North/CO-96 West to Eads. CO-96 joins US-287 into Eads.

item.title: US-287 North Approaching CO-96
item.description: US-287 North approaching CO-96 in Kiowa County.

item.title: I-25 South - Exits 99A and 98B
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 99A - To CO-96/6th St. Approaching Exit 98B - 1st St.

item.title: I-25 South - Exits 99A and 99B
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 99B - 13th St./Santa Fe Ave. Approaching Exit 99A - To CO-96/6th St.
